description: Officially launch 'Project Phoenix', a new digital marketing campaign aimed at increasing brand awareness by 20% in the 25-40 age segment. The meeting's goal was to define key messages, assign responsibilities, and set an overarching timeline for the next 6 weeks.
title: Project Phoenix Kickstarter Meeting

description: Lise Berg and Jonas Fredriksen to collaborate on creating detailed storyboards for the video concepts.
title: Develop storyboard for 5 campaign videos

conclusion: The main message will be 'Simplicity in Everyday Life'. The campaign will focus primarily on Instagram (Reels) and TikTok. A series of 5 short videos will be produced.
description: The team conducted a workshop to finalize the main messages, landing on three core concepts: 'Simplicity in Everyday Life', 'Sustainable Choice', and 'Modern Design'. Jonas presented data showing that the audience responds best to visual content on Instagram and TikTok. Lise Berg suggested producing a series of short video clips demonstrating the product in real-life situations.
title: Definition of Core Message and Target Audience

description: Silje Dahl to send a formal request to management to approve the increased budget of 100,000 NOK.
descriptionimplementation: Waiting for final figures from Erik.
title: Get approval for revised budget

conclusion: The budget is increased to 600,000 NOK. Silje Dahl is responsible for obtaining formal approval. Launch date is confirmed.
description: Silje Dahl presented the preliminary budget of 500,000 NOK. Erik Larsen suggested increasing the ad budget by 100,000 NOK to ensure sufficient reach on TikTok. The timeline was set with launch in week 3, 2026.
title: Budget and Timeline
